titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1565) to protect Second Amendment rights, ensure that all individuals who should be prohibited from buying a firearm are listed in the National Instant Criminal Background Check System, and provide a responsible and consistent background check process.

Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1565) to protect Second Amendment rights, ensure that all individuals who should be prohibited from buying a firearm are listed in the National Instant Criminal Background Check System, and provide a responsible and consistent background check process.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1565, entitled the Public Safety and Second Amendment Rights Protection Act of 2013.
